page.description: The <OBJECT>.REFERENCE_EXPRESSION_GET() method returns the expression required to reconstruct a reference to the object.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)
Form Controls (for <OBJECT> use the <CONTROL> pointer or the address of the control)

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Travel Time") ? ptr.name() ? "Travel_Time" ? ptr.Reference_Expression_Get() = ":Travel_Time.this"
